enumerations.name: GlobalTimeCrcSupportEnum
enumerations.note: This enumeration is used to define whether and how CRC on the TX side shall be utilized. Aggregated by GlobalTimeCanMaster.crcSecured, GlobalTimeEthMaster.crcSecured, GlobalTimeFrMaster.crc Secured

literals.name: crcNotSupported
literals.description:
This indicates that CRC is not supported
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=0

literals.name: crcSupported
literals.description:
This indicates that CRC is supported
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=1

enumerations.name: GlobalTimeCrcValidationEnum
enumerations.note: This enumeration provides values for the evaluation of the CRC Aggregated by GlobalTimeCanSlave.crcValidated, GlobalTimeEthSlave.crcValidated, GlobalTimeFrSlave.crc Validated

literals.name: crcIgnored
literals.description:
The CRC is supposed to be ignored
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=0

literals.name: crcNotValidated
literals.description:
The CRC is not supposed to be present. If CRC is present the message is ignored.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=1

literals.name: crcOptional
literals.description:
Either the CRC is present and then shall be validated or the CRC is not present and no CRC check is
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=3

literals.name: crcValidated
literals.description:
This CRC is supposed to be validated.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=2

enumerations.name: GlobalTimeIcvSupportEnum
enumerations.note: Defines whether an Integrity Check Value (ICV) shall be added to the sent time sync messages. Tags: atp.Status=candidate Aggregated by GlobalTimeMaster.icvSecured

literals.name: icvNotSupported
literals.description:
The ICV is not supported
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=1

enumerations.name: GlobalTimeIcvVerificationEnum
enumerations.note: This enumeration is used to define how an Integrity Check Value (ICV) shall be handled at the receiver. Tags: atp.Status=candidate Aggregated by GlobalTimeSlave.icvVerification

literals.name: icvIgnored
literals.description:
If the ICV is present, then it is ignored
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=2

literals.name: icvNotVerified
literals.description:
The ICV is not supposed to be present. If the ICV is present, then the message is ignored.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=1

literals.name: icvOptional
literals.description:
If the ICV is present, then it will be verified. If the ICV is not present, then this is also a valid reception
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=3

literals.name: icvVerified
literals.description:
The ICV is required and will be verified.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=0
